predefinedProjects.title: LED Blink
predefinedProjects.description: Control an LED connected to pin 13. Edit the code to change the blink speed!

predefinedProjects.title: Button Press
predefinedProjects.description: Press a button to toggle an LED on pin 13. Tweak the debounce or logic!

predefinedProjects.title: Potentiometer Control
predefinedProjects.description: Use a potentiometer to adjust LED brightness on pin 9.

predefinedProjects.title: Temperature Sensor
predefinedProjects.description: Read temperature from a sensor on A0 and print it to Serial.

predefinedProjects.title: Servo Motor Control
predefinedProjects.description: Control a servo on pin 9 with a potentiometer.

predefinedProjects.title: Ultrasonic Distance Sensor
predefinedProjects.description: Measure distance with an HC-SR04 and print it to Serial.

predefinedProjects.title: Traffic Light System
predefinedProjects.description: Simulate a traffic light with LEDs on pins 11, 12, and 13.
